definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
to press close to/to snuggle close/intimate
to stick close to/to press up against
worn next to the skin/close-fitting/personal (servant etc)
to discount the interest on a bill of exchange
to stick/to affix/to adhere/to paste (as in "copy and paste")/Taiwan pr. [nian2 tie1]/also written 黏貼|黏贴[nian2 tie1]

sentences.english: Stick isotropy to treat a scar what to side effect there is?
sentences.chinese: 貼同位素治療傷疤有什麼副作用？

sentences.english: "No, lady, "came the reply. "You stick it on the envelope ! "
sentences.chinese: “不，夫人，”郵務員回答說，“要貼在信封上。”

sentences.english: When greasy, dirty rags are used to wipe the tables.
sentences.chinese: 餐檯下有油脂或髒的膠貼。

sentences.english: He constantly advertised for hired hands.
sentences.chinese: 他經常貼廣告僱傭人手。

sentences.english: Please stick this stamp to the envelope before you mail the letter.
sentences.chinese: 在你寄出這封信之前，請把這張郵票貼在信封上。

sentences.english: Hours and hours I've spent pasting their bloody rot all over London.
sentences.chinese: 成天價在倫敦貼他們的那些死爛貨。

sentences.english: When the utility model is used, shaped sterilized sanitary pad paper is glued on the seat pad of a sitting closet.
sentences.chinese: 使用時將成型的消毒衛生墊紙貼在馬桶的坐墊上面。

sentences.english: Attach a stamp to the envelop and mail it.
sentences.chinese: 把郵票貼在信封上寄出去。

sentences.english: That's when I started leaving those yellow post-its on the door.
sentences.chinese: 也就在那時候開始，我會在門上貼那些黃色便條。

sentences.english: You wanna die by Post-its? Because I could make that happen.
sentences.chinese: 你想被便利貼弄死嗎？因爲我可以做到。

sentences.english: Children's room wall stickers are the primary requirements of environmental protection, followed by the style.
sentences.chinese: 兒童房牆貼的首要要求就是環保，其次纔是風格。

sentences.english: If so, you must have put stamps on the letters before you sent them. So how did people receive letters before stamps were invented, and who came up with the idea of using stamps?
sentences.chinese: 如果寄過，那你一定在寄信之前在信封上貼上了郵票。

sentences.english: Outside the house there was a notice saying 'For Sale'.
sentences.chinese: 這座房子外面有一招貼寫着“吉屋待售”。

sentences.english: This strategy prevents overeating, since you're never ravenously hungry.
sentences.chinese: 少喫多餐可以防止喫太多，因你還沒有餓到肚皮貼背。

sentences.english: Pick accuracy is affected by the mechanics of a gantry -style machine.
sentences.chinese: 門吊式貼裝機的拾取精度受其機械結構影響。

sentences.english: Blow it up and post it across the largest wall in the office.
sentences.chinese: 還可能把甘特圖放大，貼在辦公室最大的那面牆上。

definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount

(of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
